title: CryptoGudLuv
author: CryptoGudLuv
content: Escape to a Relaxing Retreat at Star Island Golf Resort!🏖️ Property Details:- Spacious 1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom Apartment- Fully Equipped Kitchen for Your Culinary Adventures🌟 Week Available: June 17th, 2023 - June 24th, 2023 🌟💲 Rental Price: $1,350.00 USD / 0.04969926 BTC⌚ Check-In/Check-Out:- Check-In: 4:00 pm, June 17th, 2023- Check-Out: 10:00 am, June 24th, 2023🔒 Refundable Security Deposit: $200.00 (required at check-in)❗ Important Information:- Must be 21 years or older with a valid ID- Major Debit/Credit Card required for Check-In Refundable Deposit Hold📅 Check-In Days: Friday, Saturday, Sunday❌ No Weekday Check-Ins Available⏰ Arrival:- Check-In Time: 4:00 pm⏰ Departure:- Check-Out Time: 10:00 am💰 Cryptocurrencies Accepted for Payments:- Bitcoin (BTC)- Ethereum (ETH)- Litecoin (LTC)- Solano (SOL)- Cardano (ADA)- Stellar (XLM)- Ripple (XRP)🌴 Don't miss this chance to experience a fantastic vacation at Star Island Golf Resort! Book your stay today and indulge in luxury, comfort, and the serenity of the beautiful surroundings.
